name: Snake!...
description: Snake is adventurous games where you need to make quick moves and find out the best way to pass through the identical colored blocks or shapes or even empty path and keep moving. Drag your finger through left and right to control the snake movement. Snake game is the perfect blend of plenty of unique levels, smart gameplay, cool 3D graphics, ultra smooth controls. Snake game is divided into plenty of levels and each level makes you more challenging and fun to play. You have to quickly act before you hit other colored shapes/blocks. Definitely, you will not regret playing this game again and again!
